src:
Diduga Terlibat Kasus Dzulmi Edin, KPK Cekal Akbar Himawan ke LN
06 Nov 2019, 12:17 by Indra Widyastuti


Diduga Terlibat Kasus Dzulmi Edin, KPK Cekal Akbar Himawan ke LN

KBRN, Medan : Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) melakukan pencekalan ke luar negeri (LN) terhadap anggota DPRD Sumatrea Utara, Akbar Himawan Buchari (AHB) yang diduga terlibat dalam kasus Walikota Medan non aktif, Dzulmi Eldin.
"KPK telah mengirimkan surat ke Ditjen Imigrasi terkait pelarangan terhadap seorang bernama Akbar Himawan Buchari dalam perkara penyidikan dugaan penerimaan suap oleh Walikota Medan,” kata Juru Bicara KPK, Febri Diansyah, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Febri mengungkapkan, pelarangan dilakukan selama 6 bulan ke depan terhitung sejak 5 November 2019. Pencekalan itu dilakukan karena adanya kebutuhan penyidikan terhadap Akbar Himawan Buchari sebagai saksi.“Sebagai saksi, ada kebutuhan penyidikan agar sewaktu-waktu dipanggil bisa datang dan tidak sedang berada di luar negeri,” ujarnya.Menurut Febri, sebelumnya KPK telah memanggil AHB sebagai saksi dengan agenda pemeriksaan pada Kamis minggu lalu. Namun yang bersangkutan tidak datang karena sedang berada di Malaysia dengan alasan berobat.
text:
Allegedly Involved in Dzulmi Edin Case, KPK Blocked Akbar Himawan to LN
Nov 6 2019, 12:17 by Indra Widyastuti


Allegedly Involved in Dzulmi Edin Case, KPK Blocked Akbar Himawan to LN

KBRN, Medan: The Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) conducted an overseas ban (LN) against North Sumatrea DPRD member, Akbar Himawan Buchari (AHB) who was allegedly involved in the case of the inactive Medan Mayor, Dzulmi Eldin.
"The KPK has sent a letter to the Directorate General of Immigration related to the ban on a man named Akbar Himawan Buchari in the case of investigating the alleged receipt of bribes by the Mayor of Medan," said KPK Spokesman, Febri Diansyah, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Febri revealed, the ban was carried out for the next 6 months starting from November 5, 2019. The ban was carried out because of the need for investigation of Akbar Himawan Buchari as a witness. "As witnesses, there is an investigation need so that at any time summoned can come and not being outside country, "he said. According to Febri, the KPK had summoned AHB as a witness with an inspection agenda on Thursday last week. But the person concerned did not come because he was in Malaysia for medical reasons.
